item.description:
let's meetup at johhny d's to listen and dance to a great world boogie / reggae band, entrain.

if you've seen entrain before, you already know it'll be a high energy night.

if you haven't seen them before, here's all you need to know: if you don't get up and move at an entrain show, well, we'll check your pulse to confirm the obvious and then we'll send a sympathy card to your family ... after the show.

check out the band bio on this Johnny D's page: http://www.johnnyds.c...

check out entrain and their music on their band website: http://www.entrain.co...

looking forward to meeting you at the show.

finding/contacting me tonight:

i'll be at johnny d's by 8:30, hanging at the bar. at 9:15 or so, i'll be at a table having dinner with three other members.

if you're making a Last Minute Decisionâ„¢ to join us, send a cell # to me via email (gakable-meetup@yahoo.com) and i'll text you my cell #.

also, please note that the johnny d's cover for the entrain show is $15.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll give a cell # to anyone who RSVPs 'Yes' or 'Maybe' by 12 Noon 10 April
item.name: Entrain @ Johnny D's
